cards.title: Yasmin Tian
cards.text: React, Boot: At the start of the game, you may discard a card to draw a card.
cards.flavor: "The Lakota aren't the only ones in Deadwood who can draw power from their faith."

cards.title: "Dynamite" Jacc
cards.text: Resolution, Boot: Ace Jacc to make the opposing posse suffer 2 extra casualties.
cards.flavor: "Who that destroyeth my flock, I will so destroy!"

cards.title: Bai Yang Chen (Exp.1)
cards.text: Bai Yang Chen cannot have attachments. While Bai Yang Chen is in a posse, after each shootout play (including passing), remove any modifiers to his bullet rating, set it to 5, and then reduce it by 1 for each card in your hand. Noon: If you have no ghost rock in your stash, draw a card.

cards.title: Huang Li
cards.text: After using Huang Li's Shootout ability: • if you booted a Blessed dude, unboot another dude in the shootout. • if you booted an Abomination, Huang Li gets +2 bullets. • if you booted a Kung Fu dude, boot an opposing dude. Shootout: Boot your dude (in this shootout) to discard a card and draw a card.

cards.title: Arthur Dingler
cards.text: React, Boot: At the start of the game, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may discard them, shuffle them into your deck, or return them to your deck in the same order. Take 1 ghost rock from the bank and add it to the pot for the Gamblin' phase.

cards.title: Deadwood Dick
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution: Boot Dick or his Horse to send any number of your dudes with Horses home booted. If your hand is legal, those dudes do not boot.
cards.flavor: "Family still call me Nathaniel, but I earned this name when I won that rodeo. I ask you to respect that."

cards.title: Al Swearengen
cards.text: Noon, Pay 4 Ghost Rock: Al permanently has +1 bullets, +1 influence, is a stud, and loses this ability.
cards.flavor: "McCall, take care of Hickok. I want him in the grave before he can bring law to this town."

cards.title: Aunt Lou Marchbanks
cards.text: While at a location you own, Aunt Lou is a stud.
cards.flavor: "Aunt Lou ain't just the greatest cook in the Black Hills, she's also the toughest. Only a fool would make trouble at her restaurant." -Deadwood Dick

cards.title: Lew Esquilin
cards.text: React, Boot At the start of the game, look at the top 6 cards of your deck. You may discard a card from your hand to reveal an Abomination or non-Unique Mystical goods and add it to your play hand. Return the other cards in your deck in the same order.

cards.title: Mourning Mist
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Ace Mourning Mist to boot a dude at this or an adjacent location.
cards.flavor: "The acrid stench of death and betrayal can freeze even the hardiest soul." -Padre Ernesto de Diaz

cards.title: Victor "Nines" de Boré
cards.text: Victor has a bonus to his Huckster skill equal to the number of Abominations at his location. This bonus cannot exceed +4.
cards.flavor: "That Hoyle's was priceless! We need to get it back now, by any means necessary!"

cards.title: The Angler
cards.text: Noon: The Angler calls out a dude at his location who has the same value. Noon: Discard a card to change The Angler's value to that card's value.

cards.title: Sifting Squirrel
cards.text: React, Boot: At the start of the game, you may draw a card and then discard a card. If you discard a Spirit or Technique, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Talk among the spirits is that a pale rider approaches from the south, bringing dark magic with him...."

cards.title: Lewis "Grizzly" Evans
cards.text: While there are no Weapons in the opposing posse, Lewis is a stud. While there is another dude in your posse, Lewis has "Shootout, Boot:" Choose and boot an opposing dude with a lower value. Neither dude contributes to draw hands unless they are the only dude in their posse."

cards.title: "Professor" Duncan (Exp.1)
cards.text: While at a location with a Totem, Duncan is a stud. React: After you play a Totem at Duncan's location, draw a card if it is the only Totem with that name at that location.

cards.title: Yiska
cards.text: While Yiska has a Sidekick, he has +2 bullets.
cards.flavor: "Mr. Hamid, I can guide your group through the Petrified Forest, but those who seek the badge killer find nothing but death."

cards.title: Dr. JT Goodenough
cards.text: React, Boot: At the start of the game, search your deck for two different non-Unique Gadget Weapons and reveal them. Your opponent chooses one to discard. Attach the other to one of your dudes, paying its ghost rock cost (without inventing). Discard a card.
cards.flavor: "Whaddaya druther?"

cards.title: Seth Bullock
cards.text: While your draw hand is cheatin', Seth lowers your hand rank by his bullet rating if he is in your posse. React: After you use a Cheatin' Resolution ability on an action card, unboot Seth.

cards.title: Clint Ramsey (Exp.1)
cards.text: Repeat React: After your opponent reveals a cheatin' hand, unboot Clint.
cards.flavor: "In my quest to help Abram hunt down this Brotherhood, I've followed them north, out west, and now to Deadwood."

cards.title: Mimi "The Nun" O'Brien
cards.text: React Before you take casualties, if Mimi is in your posse you may discard a Miracle from your hand to suffer 1 fewer casualties this round. If your hand is legal, you suffer 2 fewer casualties instead.

cards.title: Sam Bass
cards.text: While Sam is in your posse, Cheatin' Resolution abilities on action cards cost +1 ghost rock.
cards.flavor: "Let the Rangers deal with him. He's gambled away everything he's robbed here." -Seth Bullock

cards.title: Rosaleen Byrne
cards.text: React, Boot: At the start of the game, discard 2 cards from your hand to draw 2 cards.
cards.flavor: "Oh, darlin', it's not what can I do for you, it's what can you do for me."

cards.title: Jack McCall
cards.text: Shootout: If there are more dudes in your posse than in the opposing posse, give Jack 1 bounty to make him a stud.
cards.flavor: "Once I'm done with McCall, I'm going after the man who hired him." -Wild Bill Hickok

cards.title: Reggie Mallard
cards.text: Reggie has a bullet bonus equal to the number of Hucksters in his posse. This bonus cannot exceed +4.
cards.flavor: "Head straight into town and flush out the law. I've got your back."

cards.title: Alferd Packer
cards.text: While Alferd is in your posse, your opponent gains "Repeat Shootout, Pay 3 Ghost Rock: Alferd joins your posse, under y0our control."
cards.flavor: "Got any meat on ya?"

cards.title: John "Aces" Radcliffe (Exp.1)
cards.text: While John has a Gadget Weapon, he is a stud. John cannot trade away his goods. React: After John enters play, attach a Gadget Weapon from your hand or discard pile to him, paying its ghost rock cost (without inventing). If the Gadget comes from your hand, reduce its cost to 0.

cards.title: Willa Mae MacGowan (Exp.1)
cards.text: Resolution: Discard Willa Mae to send a dude in your posse home. If your opponent's hand is cheatin', unboot that dude.
cards.flavor: "Only way you'll harm a hair on these children is over my dead body!"

cards.title: New Varney Nosferatu
cards.text: If the New Varney Nosferatu is in a Public location at the beginning of High Noon, send it home booted.
cards.flavor: "Word has it we should avoid these night trains...." -Allie Hensman

cards.title: Carmichael's Livery
cards.text: This deed has +1 production and +1 control points if there is a Horse at this deed.
cards.flavor: "Take good care of her. She doesn't take kindly to strangers." -Jonah Essex

cards.title: Land Purchase
cards.text: Controller Noon Job, Boot: Mark this deed. If successful, discard this deed to choose a deed in your discard pile and play it, reducing its cost by 3.
cards.flavor: Please see Mr. Bearclaw re permits.

cards.title: Heath's Curiosity Shoppe
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Discard 2 cards. Choose a non-Unique card in your discard pile that matches the suit of one of the discarded cards and the value of the other discarded card, and put it into your hand.

cards.title: The Gem Theater
cards.text: Controller Shootout, Boot: If the shootout is at this deed, each dude in the shootout becomes a draw.
cards.flavor: "If Hickok's back from the grave, he's comin' here for McCall." -Seth Bullock

cards.title: Baird's Debt Collections
cards.text: Each time a deed is played, gain 1 ghost rock. Controller Noon, Boot: Discard a card from your hand to boot a deed.
cards.flavor: "Time to settle, Mr. Healey. Fetch what I need from Arizona." -Mr. Baird

cards.title: Cheyenne Club
cards.text: Controller Noon, Boot: Choose a dude at this or an adjacent location. That dude has +1 to each of their skill ratings (the skills are Mad Scientist, Blessed, Huckster, and Shaman).

cards.title: Nuttal & Mann's No. 10 Saloon
cards.text: Controller Noon/Shootout, Boot, Pay 1 ghost rock: Boot or unboot a dude at this deed.
cards.flavor: "I came to Deadwood to hunt, and instead I found a war. Gimme a shot, will ya?" -Shelby Hunt

cards.title: Winner's Circle Auction House
cards.text: This deed has +1 control points for each player with a dude at this deed.
cards.flavor: Doris found exploring the auction house to be more exciting than she first expected.

cards.title: Feathered Friend
cards.text: Noon, Boot: Choose a dude at this location. Look at a random card in their controller's hand. Shootout, Boot: Look at a random card in your opponent's hand.

cards.title: Bulletproof Vest
cards.text: This dude may not boot to join a posse at an adjacent location. Resolution, Boot: Discard a card from your hand to have your posse suffer 1 fewer casualties this round.

cards.title: Pale Horse
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution, Boot: You may send an opposing dude without a Horse home booted. If your hand is legal, you suffer X fewer casualties this round, where X is this dude's bullet rating.

cards.title: Kinetic Accretion Actualizer
cards.text: Repeat Shootout: Kinetic Accretion Actualizer has an additional +1 bullets until Sundown. You may use this ability once per shootout round.
cards.flavor: "Give it a spell, ain't nothin' can stop ya!" -Dr. JT Goodenough

cards.title: Missed Me!
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution Hex 5, Boot: Reduce your opponent's hand rank by the total number of Sidekicks and dudes in their posse, to a maximum of 4.
cards.flavor: "Nice aim you got there."

cards.title: Mark of War
cards.text: Noon Hex 7, Boot: This dude's call outs cannot be refused. Discard this Hex.
cards.flavor: "The Domain of War. Sounds like a fun place to stop off at next."

cards.title: We Stand Amazed
cards.text: React Miracle X, Boot: When a dude in this shootout is being discarded as a casualty, send that dude home booted instead. X is that dude's grit.
cards.flavor: "We are blessed in your light, Lord."

cards.title: Benediction
cards.text: Noon Miracle 6: Choose another dude at this or an adjacent location. That dude has +2 to each of their skill ratings (the skills are Huckster, Blessed, Shaman, and Mad Scientist). If they do not have a skill, this dude has +1 bullets.

cards.title: Guiding the Pack
cards.text: Shootout Spirit 5, Boot: If there are more dudes in your posse than the opposing posse, boot an opposing card. If you succeed by 4 or more, choose one of your dudes. That dude has + bullets.

cards.title: Elk's Protection
cards.text: Can only attach to a deed. Noon Spirit 8, Boot: Choose a dude without a Weapon. That dude has +X bullets. X is this deed's printed production. Shootout Spirit 8, Boot: Choose a dude without a We3apon. That dude has +X bullets. X is this deed's printed production.

cards.title: Get Off My Land!
cards.text: React: After an opposing dude moves to a deed you own, move your dude to that deed from an adjacent location. This card's ghost rock cost is equal to the opposing dude's influence.
cards.flavor: "I'll let you in on Mr. Baird's plans if you put that down." -Lane Healey

cards.title: Look What I Found!
cards.text: Shootout: Choose a non-Unique Weapon in your discard pile and attach it to a dude in your posse, paying all costs. Boot a Weapon or Sidekick attached to that dude.
cards.flavor: "Well aren't you resourceful! Good dog!" -Leychaa'i Youngheart

cards.title: Mantis Pinch
cards.text: Noon Technique: Choose a printed ability on a card at this location. That ability cannot be used. Shootout Technique: Choose a printed ability on a card at this shootout. That ability cannot be used until after Sundown.

cards.title: As Nature and God Intended
cards.text: Shootout: All Weapons lose their bullet bonuses, traits, and Shootout abilities until the end of this round of the shootout. Dudes with Kung Fu are studs until the end of this round of the shootout.
cards.flavor: "Mano a mano, mi amigo!"

cards.title: Play for Blood
cards.text: Resolution: If draw hand ranks are tied, increase your draw hand rank by 1. Noon: Draw a card and discard a card.
cards.flavor: "That's just my game, Ringo. Say when." -Doc Holliday

cards.title: Bad Beat
cards.text: Cheatin' Resolution: Discard the cheatin' player's draw hand and replace it with the top five cards of their deck. If the replacement draw hand is cheatin', take up to 2 ghost rock from that player.
cards.flavor: "Little help from the Devil did the trick." -Dave "Slim" Gorman

cards.title: Fallen Star
cards.text: React: After your dude is chosen by an opponent's Shootout ability, boot a dude in your posse that could have been chosen. The booted dude is chosen instead.
cards.flavor: "Real life is nothing like a dime novel. There's nothing but despair waiting for us all." -Xiong "Wendy" Cheng

cards.title: Masonic Augment
cards.text: Noon/Shootout: Discard a spell you own and control to choose one of your dudes. That dude has +1 bullets and +1 influence. If the spell was unbooted, gain ghost rock equal to the spell's printed cost.
cards.flavor: "We'll bind the spirits to learn more of our new challenger." -Lew Esquilin

cards.title: Swagger
cards.text: Noon: Move your unbooted dude to an adjacent location. That dude has +1 influence for controlling deeds until the end of the next Upkeep phase.
cards.flavor: "Time to bless a new town with my appearance." -Pancho Castillo

cards.title: Vamoosin'
cards.text: Shootout: Send a wanted dude home. This card's ghost rock cost is equal to the wanted dude's influence.
cards.flavor: "Have to know when to fold 'em, Clint. We'll face Adler again, mark my words." -Willa Mae McGowan
